configuration.name: Auto openzwave lib path detection
configuration.description: Set to True for openzwave configuration path auto detection, else use configpath. [default : True]

configuration.name: Openzwave Configuration Path
configuration.description: Path for openzwave files configuration (see your openzwave installation).

configuration.name: Send complet message
configuration.description: Message complet confirmation send as notification (see doc to use it at True). [default : False]. In any case, if exist, the value of openzwave option.xml file is the last considered.

configuration.name: Enable openzwave log
configuration.description: Active openzwave log (see file OZW_Log.txt in User path). WARNING file not in rotate mode, file should beging ernormous ! [default : False]. In any case, if exist, the value of openzwave option.xml file is the last considered.
